actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States authorizing the President to veto an item of appropriation in any Act or resolution containing such an item.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President line item veto authority with respect to appropriations bills, except for an item of appropriation for the judicial branch of the Federal Government.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States authorizing the President to veto an item of appropriation in any Act or resolution containing such an item.
